DisplayName: Authentication Attempt from a new country
Name: 9e84e5c8-7a53-4264-a5f5-573a8b2e4757
Query:
let KnownLocations = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated between(ago(14d) .. ago(1h))
    | where ResultType == 0
    | summarize UserKnownLocation = make_set(Location) by UserPrincipalName;
let AnomalousSignIn = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) // CHANGE IT DEPENDING ON RULE FREQUENCY
    | where ResultType in (0,500121)
    | where isnotempty(Location)
    | join kind=leftouter KnownLocations on UserPrincipalName
    | where tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType) == ""
    | extend AnomalousLocationDetail = Location
    | where not(UserKnownLocation has AnomalousLocationDetail);
let ManagedAttempts = SigninLogs
    | union AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where (tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_dynamic).trustType) != "" or tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_string).trustType) != "") or (DeviceDetail_dynamic or DeviceDetail_string contains "PII Removed")
    | summarize IPManagedAttempts = count() by IPAddress;
let NonInterKnownLocation = AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. ago(1h))
    | where ResultType == 0
    | summarize NonInterKnownLocations = make_set(Location) by UserPrincipalName;
let AnomalousNonInterSignin = AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
    | join kind=leftouter NonInterKnownLocation on UserPrincipalName
    | where ResultType != 50126 and ResultType != 50053
    | where isnotempty(Location)
    | where not(NonInterKnownLocations has Location)
    | where Location in ("RU", "UA", "DZ", "AO", "BJ", "BW", "BF", "BI", "CM", "CV", "CF", "TD", "KM", "CD", "CI", "DJ", "EG", "GQ", "ER", "SZ", "ET", "GA", "GM", "GH", "GW", "KE", "LS", "LR", "MG", "MW", "ML", "MR", "MU", "YT", "MA", "MZ", "NA", "NE", "NG", "RE", "RW", "SH", "ST", "SN", "SC", "SL", "SO", "ZA", "SS", "SD", "TZ", "TG", "TN", "UG", "EG")
    | summarize
        Device = make_set(DeviceDetail),
        ClientApp =make_set(ClientAppUsed),
        Set_Result = make_set(ResultType),
        Set_Status = make_set(Status),
        Applications = make_set(AppDisplayName),
        RiskType = make_set(RiskEventTypes),
        RiskTypeV2 = make_set(RiskEventTypes_V2),
        UserAgent = make_set(UserAgent),
        Time = make_set(TimeGenerated, 1),
        NormalLocationsfrom2weeks = make_set(NonInterKnownLocations),
        AuthDetails = make_set(AuthenticationDetails)
        by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, Location, Type
    | join kind=leftouter ManagedAttempts on IPAddress
    | extend IPManagedAttempts = coalesce(IPManagedAttempts, 0)
    | project-away IPAddress1
    | project-reorder
        Time,
        UserPrincipalName,
        IPAddress,
        Location,
        NormalLocationsfrom2weeks,
        Type,
        Set_Result,
        Set_Status,
        AuthDetails,
        Applications,
        Device,
        ClientApp,
        UserAgent,
        RiskType,
        RiskTypeV2,
        IPManagedAttempts
    | where IPManagedAttempts == 0;
let GetEmailDetails = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where isnotempty(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem ) or isnotempty(parse_json(DeviceDetail).browser )
| extend Device = iff(isempty( DeviceDetail.operatingSystem),(tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).browser)),(tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).operatingSystem)))
| extend Device = iff(Device contains "Safari","Ios ",Device)
| summarize Devices = make_set(Device), ResultType = make_set(ResultType), AuthenticationRequirement = make_set(AuthenticationRequirement) by UserPrincipalName,IPAddress,Location,LocationDetail = strcat(Location, "-", LocationDetails.state)
| extend SuccessorFailed = iff(array_index_of(ResultType, "0") != -1, "successful", "failed");
AnomalousSignIn
| summarize
    Device = make_set(DeviceDetail),
    ClientApp =make_set(ClientAppUsed),
    Set_Result = make_set(ResultType),
    Set_Status = make_set(Status),
    Applications = make_set(AppDisplayName),
    RiskType = make_set(RiskEventTypes),
    RiskTypeV2 = make_set(RiskEventTypes_V2),
    UserAgent = make_set(UserAgent),
    Time = min(TimeGenerated),
    NormalLocationsfrom2weeks = make_set(UserKnownLocation),
    AuthDetails = make_set(AuthenticationDetails)
    by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, AnomalousLocationDetail
| join kind=leftouter ManagedAttempts on IPAddress
| extend IPManagedAttempts = coalesce(IPManagedAttempts, 0)
| project-away IPAddress1
| join kind=leftouter GetEmailDetails on UserPrincipalName,IPAddress,$left.AnomalousLocationDetail == $right.Location
| extend formatted_time = format_datetime(todatetime(Time), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| extend AuthRequirement = iff(AuthenticationRequirement contains "multifactor", 'multifactor authentication', 'singlefactor authentication')
| extend EmailTemplate = strcat("Hi,\n\nKindly note that an alert was raised on ", formatted_time, " [UTC] due to the user ", UserPrincipalName, " having unfamiliar sign-in properties. Upon our investigations, we found that the user had ", SuccessorFailed," ", AuthRequirement, " attempts accessing the applications ", Applications, " from the IP address ", IPAddress, " which classified as (CLEAN OR VPN) and is located in ", LocationDetail, ". The attempt was through non-managed and non-compliant ", Devices, " device.\n\nKindly note that the user's previous login locations is from ", NormalLocationsfrom2weeks, ".\n\nCan you please confirm if this is an expected activity?\n\nRegards,\n\nSOC")
| project-reorder
    Time,
    UserPrincipalName,
    IPAddress,
    AnomalousLocationDetail,
    NormalLocationsfrom2weeks,
    Set_Result,
    Set_Status,
    AuthDetails,
    Applications,
    Device,
    ClientApp,
    UserAgent,
    RiskType,
    RiskTypeV2,
    EmailTemplate,
    IPManagedAttempts
| project-away UserPrincipalName1,IPAddress1,Location,formatted_time,AuthRequirement
| where IPManagedAttempts == 0
